note.p: Banker. Educated at Charterhouse; entered the banking-house of Gurneys & Co. (later Barclay’s), in which his grandfather Dawson Turner was a partner. Wrote on banking, statistics, and currency. Editor, the Economist, 1877–83. Brother of Francis Turner and William Gifford Palgrave. Knighted, 1909. FRS 1882.
Men and women of the time 1899, The Times 28 January 1919, p. 11.
